original_text: The Philistines also sent five gold mice. There was one gold mouse for each of the five towns that had a ruler. Those were strong cities that had walls around them. Each town also had villages near to it. The large rock where the Levites put the Lord's Covenant Box is still there. So we remember what happened that day in Joshua's field in Beth Shemesh.
korean_text: 드린 바 금 쥐들은 견고한 성읍에서부터 시골의 마을에까지 그리고 사람들이 여호와의 궤를 큰 돌에 이르기까지 다섯 방백들에게 속한 블레셋 사람들의 모든 성읍들의 수대로였더라 그 돌은 벧세메스 사람 여호수아의 밭에 오늘까지 있더라

sentences.original_text: The Philistines also sent five gold mice.
sentences.korean_translation: 블레셋 사람들도 다섯 마리의 금쥐를 보냈습니다.

sentences.original_text: There was one gold mouse for each of the five towns
sentences.korean_translation: 다섯 도시 각각에 한 마리의 금쥐가 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: Each town also had villages near to it.
The large rock where the Levites put the Lord's Covenant Box
sentences.korean_translation: 레위 사람들이 주님의 언약 궤를 둔 큰 바위는

sentences.original_text: So we remember what happened that day
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 우리는 그날 일어난 일을 기억합니다.

sentences.original_text: in Joshua's field in Beth Shemesh.
